page.title: 10A day in the life of Becky
page.content: On a Wednesday I wake up at 07.00. and I have cornflakes for breakfast at 07.15. Then I feed my two rabbits and guinea_pigs. At 07.45. I walk down the lane to the bus-stop. The bus comes at 08.20. School starts at 08.45.Assembly is at about 09.15. Then at 10.30 it is playtime. At 12.00 we have lunch. Afterwards we have another playtime. School finishes at 15.00 and then we get on the bus again. I get home at 15.45 and then I put my fish pump on. Afterwards I pick some grass for the rabbits and guinea-pigs and then I play on the computer or watch the television.I have my dinner at 17.00 because I go to swimming club. At 18.20. I go to Calne Sports Centre. I start swimming at 19.00 and at 20.00 I go home.Then I watch the television again, until, at about 21.15., I go to bed.
